thread.section_title: Mabel's Labels Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Mabel's Labels | mabelslabels.com
thread.title: Janine

author: Janine
title: Janine
text: These labels are so helpful! The clothing labels stay on even after many washes, shoe labels stay in and the mini lables stay on all my children's lunch containers and water bottles, even after many runs through the dishwasher! I bought the school starter pack and it lasted both of my children through almost 2 years of school. I even used them on my son's hockey gear and they have held up! My kid's also loved customizing their own labels online.
